name: React
description: JavaScript library for building fast, interactive user interfaces.

description: Used to develop cross-platform mobile applications with JavaScript and React.

name: JavaScript
description: Core programming language of the web, enabling dynamic and interactive functionality.

name: HTML
description: Markup language for structuring and displaying content on the web.

name: CSS
description: Stylesheet language for creating visually appealing and responsive web layouts.

name: SCSS
description: CSS preprocessor adding variables, nesting, and mixins for cleaner styling.

name: Bootstrap

name: Redux

name: Git
description: Version control system for tracking code changes and enabling team collaboration.
